text: Cake is a 2014 American drama film directed by Daniel Barnz, written by Patrick Tobin, and starring Jennifer Aniston, Adriana Barraza, Felicity Huffman, William H. Macy, Anna Kendrick, and Sam Worthington. It debuted in the Special Presentations section of the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival.Aniston's portrayal of a damaged woman struggling with chronic pain and tragedy received strong praise and earned her nominations for the Screen Actors Guild Award and Golden Globe Award.
